name: Brainbug
description:
"Last night the brainbug was in your head.
Naturally, you fell in love with it."

You just killed a man, but that's okay. The urge to possess something can force people into doing terrible things. But the end justifies the means and nobody can stop you from achieving your goal: the Brainbug.

A playthrough of this short point and click game should take you about 15 minutes and offers a weird little story and a few small puzzles.

This is the first game I made on my own and it was mainly meant to help me get into game development. But I liked the outcome and therefor I decided to release it. If you enjoy it, there's more to come!
